name: Piozila
description:
Piozila is a grid-based movement puzzle game with adorable colorful graphics.

Your objective is to help a small chameleon to advance in the adventure by intelligently moving the chameleon and other objects.

You will be able to move many objects such as a tree, a car, a bed, the toilet bowl and more.

A chameleon called Leon who can change color will have to avoid humans.

Leon is a glutton, he likes to eat a lot and the more he moves, the hungrier he will be.

You will have to find the right path because Leon dies if he is too hungry.

Beware of fires and traps.
